caption.p: CHIKV titers in Poza Rica A. aegypti strain from Mexico. Ae. aegypti (Poza Rica) were orally infected with either CHIKV R99659 (blood meal virus titer 6 × 10 7 pfu/mL) and CHIKV LR2006 OPY1 (blood meal virus titer 3 × 10 7 pfu/mL). Virus titers were determined 9 days later by plaque assay in salivary glands and saliva. The number of mosquitoes assayed for each CHIKV strain and the prevalence (% infection) of CHIKV in saliva are listed. Horizontal bars show mean titer values with SEM.
